00070 StimApp::StimApp(int & argc, char ** argv)
00071     : QApplication(argc, argv, true), consoleWindow(0), glWindow(0), glWinHasFrame(true), debug(false), initializing(true), server(0), nLinesInLog(0), nLinesInLogMax(1000), glWinSize(DEFAULT_WIN_SIZE) /* default plugin size */
00072 {
00073     if (singleton) {
00074         QMessageBox::critical(0, "Invariant Violation", "Only 1 instance of StimApp allowed per application!");
00075         std::exit(1);
00076     }
00077 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00078     refresh = 120;
00079 #endif
00080     Connect(this, SIGNAL(aboutToQuit()), this, SLOT(quitCleanup()));
00081     singleton = this;
00082     if (!::init) ::init = new Init;
00083     loadSettings();
00084 
00085     installEventFilter(this); // filter our own events
00086 
00087     consoleWindow = new ConsoleWindow;
00088     defaultLogColor = consoleWindow->textEdit()->textColor();
00089 
00090     Log() << "Application started";
00091 
00092     consoleWindow->installEventFilter(this);
00093     consoleWindow->textEdit()->installEventFilter(this);
00094 
00095     createGLWindow(false);
00096     glWindow->show();
00097 
00098     getHWFrameCount(); // forces error message to print once if frame count func is not found
00099     consoleWindow->setWindowTitle("StimulateOpenGL II");
00100     consoleWindow->resize(800, 300);
00101     int delta = 0;
00102 #ifdef Q_WS_X11
00103     delta += 22; // this is a rough guesstimate to correct for window frame size being unknown on X11
00104 #endif
00105     consoleWindow->move(0,glWindow->frameSize().height()+delta);
00106     consoleWindow->show();
00107 
00108     if (getNProcessors() > 2)
00109         setProcessAffinityMask(0x2|0x4); // set it to core 2 and core 3
00110     
00111 
00112     setRTPriority();
00113     setVSyncMode();
00114 
00115     glWindow->initPlugins();    
00116 
00117     initServer();
00118 
00119     createAppIcon();
00120 
00121 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00122     if (getenv("NOCALIB")) {
00123 #endif
00124         initializing = false;
00125         Log() << "Application initialized";    
00126 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00127     } else
00128         calibrateRefresh();
00129 #endif
00130 
00131     QTimer *timer = new QTimer(this);
00132     Connect(timer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(updateStatusBar()));
00133     timer->setSingleShot(false);
00134     timer->start(247); // update status bar every 247ms.. i like this non-round-numbre.. ;)
00135 }

00137 void StimApp::createGLWindow(bool initPlugs)
00138 {

00140     glWindow->move(0,0);
00141

00145 #ifndef Q_OS_WIN
00146 void StimApp::calibrateRefresh()
00147 {
00148     StimPlugin *p = glWindow->pluginFind("calibplugin"), *r = 0;
00149     if (!p) {
00150         QMessageBox::critical(0,
00151                               "Fatal Error", 
00152                               "Could not find refresh rate calibration plugin",
00153                               QMessageBox::Abort);
00154         std::exit(1);
00155     } else {
00156                       if ((r=glWindow->runningPlugin()) && r != p) {
00157                                  unloadStim();
00158                                  r = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00159                                  if (r && r != p) return; // user must have aborted the operation
00160                       }
00161         Log() << "Calibrating refresh rate...";
00162         refresh = 120;
00163 
00164         // temporarily suppress this notification of leodaqgl for this calib plugin
00165         p->start(true); // note this plugin ends up calling the calibratedRefresh() slot which then continues with initialization
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 void StimApp::calibratedRefresh(unsigned rate)
00170 {
00171 #if defined(Q_OS_WIN) && !defined(Q_WS_X11)
00172     Log() << "Calibrated refresh: " << rate << "Hz, hardware says: " << (refresh=getHWRefreshRate()) << "Hz";
00173     if (refresh != rate) {
00174         Warning() << "Measured framerate differs from hardware rate.  Possible dropped frames?";
00175     }
00176            refresh = rate;
00177     //refresh = MIN(rate, refresh);
00178     Log() << "Using refresh rate of " << refresh << "Hz";
00179 #else 
00180     refresh = rate;
00181     Log() << "Calibrated refresh: " << refresh << "Hz";
00182 #endif
00183 
00184     if (initializing) {
00185         initializing = false;
00186         Log() << "Application initialized";
00187     }
00188 }
00189 #endif

00199 void StimApp::quitCleanup()
00200 {
00201     // NB: should delete these because they may have child objects with non-trivial destructors..
00202     if (glWindow) delete glWindow, glWindow = 0;
00203     if (consoleWindow) delete consoleWindow, consoleWindow = 0;
00204 }

00218 bool StimApp::eventFilter(QObject *watched, QEvent *event)
00219 {
00220     int type = static_cast<int>(event->type());
00221     if (type == QEvent::KeyPress) {
00222         // globally forward all keypresses to the glwindow
00223         // if they aren't handled, then return false for normal event prop.
00224         QKeyEvent *k = dynamic_cast<QKeyEvent *>(event);
00225         if (k && (watched == consoleWindow || watched == consoleWindow->textEdit())) 
00226             // force events for consoleWindow or textedit to the glwindow
00227             // note that the glWindow will also end up in this function
00228             // but will propagate down to QApplication::eventFilter() at bottom
00229             return sendEvent(glWindow, k);
00230     } 
00231     ConsoleWindow *cw = dynamic_cast<ConsoleWindow *>(watched);
00232     if (cw) {
00233         if (type == LogLineEventType) {
00234             LogLineEvent *evt = dynamic_cast<LogLineEvent *>(event);
00235             if (evt && cw->textEdit()) {
00236                 QTextEdit *te = cw->textEdit();
00237                 QColor origcolor = te->textColor();
00238                 te->setTextColor(evt->color);
00239                 te->append(evt->str);
00240 
00241                 // make sure the log textedit doesn't grow forever
00242                 // so prune old lines when a threshold is hit
00243                 nLinesInLog += evt->str.split("\n").size();
00244                 if (nLinesInLog > nLinesInLogMax) {
00245                     const int n2del = MAX(nLinesInLogMax/10, nLinesInLog-nLinesInLogMax);
00246                     QTextCursor cursor = te->textCursor();
00247                     cursor.movePosition(QTextCursor::Start);
00248                     for (int i = 0; i < n2del; ++i) {
00249                         cursor.movePosition(QTextCursor::Down, QTextCursor::KeepAnchor);
00250                     }
00251                     cursor.removeSelectedText(); // deletes the lines, leaves a blank line
00252                     nLinesInLog -= n2del;
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 te->setTextColor(origcolor);
00256                 te->moveCursor(QTextCursor::End);
00257                 te->ensureCursorVisible();
00258                 return true;
00259             } else {
00260                 return false;
00261             }
00262         } else if (type == StatusMsgEventType) {
00263             StatusMsgEvent *evt = dynamic_cast<StatusMsgEvent *>(event);
00264             if (evt && cw->statusBar()) {
00265                 cw->statusBar()->showMessage(evt->msg, evt->timeout);
00266                 return true;
00267             } else {
00268                 return false;
00269             }
00270         }
00271     }
00272     if (watched == this) {
00273         if (type == QuitEventType) {
00274             quit();
00275             return true;
00276         }
00277     }
00278     // otherwise do default action for event which probably means
00279     // propagate it down
00280     return QApplication::eventFilter(watched, event);
00281 }

00283 void StimApp::logLine(const QString & line, const QColor & c)
00284 {
00285     qApp->postEvent(consoleWindow, new LogLineEvent(line, c.isValid() ? c : defaultLogColor));
00286 }

00288 void StimApp::initServer()
00289 {
00290     class MyTcpServer : public QTcpServer
00291     {
00292     public:
00293         MyTcpServer(StimApp *parent) : QTcpServer(parent) {}
00294     protected:
00295         void incomingConnection(int sock) {
00296             QThread *thr = new ConnectionThread(sock, this);
00297             Connect(thr, SIGNAL(finished()), thr, SLOT(deleteLater()));
00298             thr->start();
00299             thr->setPriority(QThread::LowPriority);
00300         }
00301     };
00302 
00303     server = new MyTcpServer(this);
00304     static const unsigned short port = 4141;
00305     if (!server->listen(QHostAddress::Any, port)) {
00306         Error() << "Tcp server could not listen on port " << port;
00307         int but = QMessageBox::critical(0, "Network Listen Error", "Tcp server could not listen on port " + QString::number(port) + "\nAnother copy of this program might already be running.\nContinue anyway?", QMessageBox::Abort, QMessageBox::Ignore);
00308         if (but == QMessageBox::Abort) postEvent(this, new QEvent((QEvent::Type)QuitEventType)); // quit doesn't work here because we are in appliation c'tor
00309     } else {
00310         Log() << "Tcp server started, listening for connections on port " << server->serverPort();
00311     }
00312 }

00314 void StimApp::loadSettings()
00315 {
00316     QSettings settings("janelia.hhmi.org", "StimulateOpenGL_II");
00317 
00318     settings.beginGroup("StimApp");
00319     debug = settings.value("debug", true).toBool();
00320     lastFile = settings.value("lastFile", "").toString();
00321     mut.lock();
00322 #ifdef Q_OS_WIN
00323     outDir = settings.value("outDir", "c:/users/code/StimulusLogs").toString();
00324 #else
00325     outDir = settings.value("outDir", QDir::homePath() + "/StimulusLogs").toString();
00326 #endif
00327     mut.unlock();
00328 
00329     struct LeoDAQGLNotifyParams & leoDaq (leoDAQGLNotifyParams);
00330     leoDaq.enabled = settings.value("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Enabled", true).toBool();
00331     leoDaq.hostname = settings.value("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Host", "localhost").toString();
00332     leoDaq.port = settings.value("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Port",  LEODAQ_GL_NOTIFY_DEFAULT_PORT).toUInt();
00333     leoDaq.timeout_ms = settings.value("LeoDAQGL_Notify_TimeoutMS", LEODAQ_GL_NOTIFY_DEFAULT_TIMEOUT_MSECS ).toInt();    
00334 }
00335 
00336 void StimApp::saveSettings()
00337 {
00338     QSettings settings("janelia.hhmi.org", "StimulateOpenGL_II");
00339 
00340     settings.beginGroup("StimApp");
00341     settings.setValue("debug", debug);
00342     settings.setValue("lastFile", lastFile);
00343     mut.lock();
00344     settings.setValue("outDir", outDir);
00345     mut.unlock();
00346 
00347     struct LeoDAQGLNotifyParams & leoDaq (leoDAQGLNotifyParams);
00348     settings.setValue("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Enabled", leoDaq.enabled);
00349     settings.setValue("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Host", leoDaq.hostname);
00350     settings.setValue("LeoDAQGL_Notify_Port",  leoDaq.port);
00351     settings.setValue("LeoDAQGL_Notify_TimeoutMS", leoDaq.timeout_ms);    
00352 }

00375 void StimApp::updateStatusBar()
00376 {
00377     StimPlugin *p = 0;
00378     Status sb;
00379     if (glWindow && (p = glWindow->runningPlugin())) {
00380         sb << p->name() << " " << (glWindow->isPaused() ? "paused " : "running ");
00381         sb << " - Frame " << p->getFrameNum();
00382         sb << " - FPS Avg/Min/Max: " << p->getFps() << "/" << p->getFpsMin() << "/" << p->getFpsMax();
00383         if (p->getSBString().length())
00384             sb << " - " << p->getSBString();
00385     } else {
00386         sb << "No plugins running (hit L to load a plugin)";
00387     }
00388 }

00400 struct ReentrancyPreventer
00401 {
00402     static volatile int ct;
00405     ReentrancyPreventer() { ++ct; }
00408     ~ReentrancyPreventer() {--ct; }
00410     operator bool() const { return ct == 1; }
00411 };
00412 volatile int ReentrancyPreventer::ct = 0;
00413 
00414 void StimApp::loadStim()
00415 {
00416     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00417 
00418     QString lf;
00419     if ( !(lf = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(0, "Choose a protocol spec to open", lastFile)).isNull() ) { 
00420         lastFile = lf;
00421         saveSettings(); // just to remember the file *now*
00422         QFile f(lastFile);
00423         if (!f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly|QIODevice::Text)) {
00424             QMessageBox::critical(0, "Could not open", QString("Could not open '") + lastFile + "' for reading.");
00425             return;
00426         }
00427         QTextStream ts(&f);
00428         QString line;
00429         line = ts.readLine().trimmed();
00430         Debug() << "stim plugin: " << line;
00431         StimPlugin *pfound = glWindow->pluginFind(line), *p = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00432         if (!pfound) {
00433             QMessageBox::critical(0, "Plugin not found", QString("Plugin '") + line + "' not found.");
00434             return;
00435         }
00436         if (p && p->getFrameNum() > -1) {
00437             bool doSave = 0; //QMessageBox::question(0, "Save data?", QString("Save data for currently-running '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No) == QMessageBox::Yes;
00438             if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin()) {
00439                 QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00440                                          "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00441             } else {
00442                 p->stop(doSave, true);
00443             }
00444         }
00445         p = pfound;
00446 
00447         StimParams params;
00448         QString paramsBuf;  
00449         QTextStream tsparams(&paramsBuf, QIODevice::WriteOnly|QIODevice::Truncate|QIODevice::Text);
00450         // now parse remaining lines which should be name/value pairs
00451         while ( !(line = ts.readLine()).isNull() ) {
00452             tsparams << line << "\n";
00453         }
00454         tsparams.flush();
00455         params.fromString(paramsBuf);
00456 
00457         {
00458             // custom window size handling: mon_x_pix and mon_y_pix
00459             QSize desiredSize(DEFAULT_WIN_SIZE);
00460             if (params.contains("mon_x_pix")) 
00461                 desiredSize.setWidth(params["mon_x_pix"].toUInt());
00462             if (params.contains("mon_y_pix")) 
00463                 desiredSize.setHeight(params["mon_y_pix"].toUInt());
00464             
00465             if (desiredSize != glWinSize && !desiredSize.isEmpty()) {
00466                 Log() << "GLWindow size changed to: " << desiredSize.width() << "x" << desiredSize.height();
00467                 QString pname = p->name();
00468                 // need to (re)create the gl window with the desired size!
00469                 QDesktopWidget desktop;
00470                 const QRect screenRect(desktop.screenGeometry(glWindow));
00471                 delete glWindow;
00472                 glWinSize = desiredSize;                
00473                 createGLWindow();
00474                 glWindow->move(screenRect.x(), screenRect.y());
00475                 glWindow->show();
00476                 p = pfound = glWindow->pluginFind(pname);
00477             }
00478         }
00479 
00480         QFileInfo fi(lastFile);
00481         Log() << fi.fileName() << " loaded";
00482         p->setParams(params);       
00483         p->start();
00484         glWindow->setWindowTitle(QString("StimulateOpenGL II - ") + fi.fileName());
00485     }
00486 }
00487 
00488 void StimApp::unloadStim()
00489 {
00490     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00491     StimPlugin *p = glWindow->runningPlugin();
00492     if (p) { // if there is a running plugin and it actually ran
00493         int b = QMessageBox::question(0, "Really stop plugin?", QString("Are you sure you wish to stop '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Ok, QMessageBox::Cancel);
00494         if (b == QMessageBox::Ok) {
00495             if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin())
00496                 QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00497                                          "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00498             else if (p->getFrameNum() > -1) {
00499                 bool doSave = 0; //QMessageBox::question(0, "Save data?", QString("Save data for '") + p->name() + "'?", QMessageBox::Yes, QMessageBox::No) == QMessageBox::Yes;
00500                 if (p != glWindow->runningPlugin()) {
00501                     QMessageBox::information(0, "Already unloaded", 
00502                                              "Plugin already unloaded in the meantime!");
00503                 } else
00504                     p->stop(doSave, true);
00505                 
00506             }
00507         }
00508     }
00509 }

00521 bool StimApp::setOutputDirectory(const QString & dpath)
00522 {
00523     QDir d(dpath);
00524     if (!d.exists()) return false;
00525     mut.lock();
00526     outDir = dpath;
00527     mut.unlock();
00528     return true;
00529 }
00530 
00531 void StimApp::pickOutputDir()
00532 {
00533     ReentrancyPreventer rp; if (!rp) return;
00534     mut.lock();
00535     QString od = outDir;
00536     mut.unlock();
00537     if ( !(od = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(0, "Choose a directory to which to save output files", od, QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks|QFileDialog::ShowDirsOnly)).isNull() ) { 
00538         mut.lock();
00539         outDir = od;
00540         mut.unlock();
00541         saveSettings(); // just to remember the file *now*
00542     }
00543 }

00545 void StimApp::createAppIcon()
00546 {
00547     QPixmap pm(QSize(128, 128));
00548     pm.fill(Qt::transparent);
00549     QRadialGradient gradient(50, 50, 50, 50, 50);
00550     gradient.setColorAt(0, QColor::fromRgbF(1, 0, 0, 1));
00551     gradient.setColorAt(1, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 0, 0));
00552     QPainter painter(&pm);
00553     painter.fillRect(0, 0, 128, 128, gradient);
00554     painter.end();
00555     consoleWindow->setWindowIcon(QIcon(pm));
00556     
00557     pm.fill(Qt::transparent);
00558     painter.begin(&pm);
00559     
00560     gradient.setColorAt(0, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 1, 1));
00561     gradient.setColorAt(1, QColor::fromRgbF(0, 0, 0, 0));
00562 
00563     painter.fillRect(0, 0, 128, 128, gradient);
00564 
00565     glWindow->setWindowIcon(QIcon(pm));
00566 }

00573 void StimApp::hideUnhideConsole()
00574 {
00575     if (consoleWindow) {
00576         if (consoleWindow->isHidden()) consoleWindow->show();
00577         else {
00578             bool hadfocus = ( focusWidget() == consoleWindow );
00579             consoleWindow->hide();
00580             if (glWindow && hadfocus) glWindow->setFocus(Qt::OtherFocusReason);
00581         }
00582     }
00583 }
00584 
00585 void StimApp::alignGLWindow()
00586 {
00587     if (glWindow) {
00588         if (glWindow->runningPlugin()) {
00589             Warning() << "Align of GLWindow not possible while a plugin is loaded.  Please unload the current Stim Plugin then try to align again.";
00590         } else {
00591             QDesktopWidget desktop;
00592             const QRect screenRect(desktop.screenGeometry(glWindow));
00593             delete glWindow;
00594             glWinHasFrame = !glWinHasFrame;
00595             createGLWindow();
00596             glWindow->aMode = !glWinHasFrame; // 'A' mode if we lack a frame
00597             glWindow->move(screenRect.x(), screenRect.y());
00598             glWindow->show();
00599         }
00600     }
00601 }
00602 
00603 void StimApp::leoDAQGLIntegrationDialog()
00604 {
00605     QDialog dlg(0);
00606     dlg.setWindowTitle("LeoDAQGL Integration Options");
00607     dlg.setWindowIcon(consoleWindow->windowIcon());
00608     dlg.setModal(true);
00609     LeoDAQGLNotifyParams & p (leoDAQGLNotifyParams);
00610 
00611     Ui::LeoDAQGLIntegration controls;
00612     controls.setupUi(&dlg);
00613     controls.enabledGB->setChecked(p.enabled);
00614     controls.hostNameLE->setText(p.hostname);
00615     controls.portSB->setValue(p.port);
00616     controls.timeoutSB->setValue(p.timeout_ms);    
00617     if ( dlg.exec() == QDialog::Accepted ) {
00618         p.enabled = controls.enabledGB->isChecked();
00619         p.hostname = controls.hostNameLE->text();
00620         p.port = controls.portSB->value();
00621         p.timeout_ms = controls.timeoutSB->value();
00622     }
00623     saveSettings();
00624 }
